name: QwikPitch
tag_list: startup, funding, venture, venture-capital, capital, invest, investor, connect, network, pitch
overview:
QwikPitch connects entrepreneurs and investors in the most simple, qwik, and effective way ever utilizing the one thing everyone needs: Opportunity.

As Investors & VC’s know, time is money and no investor has the time to read every email or business plan that comes their way. With QwikPitch, a free service for any investor or VC, this problem becomes a thing of the past. Simply become a member of our network and we’ll have all your business plans and emails redirected to us. If its something that fits your investing ideology or that’s beneficial to you we’ll connect you to the startup. It comes with an evaluative report highlighting major parts of the business that are both flawed and its advantages. Its easy for Investors and VC’s to see the important parts of the business and yes its confidential. Consider us your own private agent.

As any entrepreneur knows the contact with a VC or Investor is simply one of the most frustrating and extensive process in discovering funding. With QwikPitch, simply sign up online, pitch to us, and let us try and find you the right investor interested in you. Opportunity has never knocked so loud.

We urge any entrepreneur or Investor to become a part of the network. The opportunities for everyone is endless.
